name: Other applicant not applied for a conditional order SOLICITOR
body:
Case number: ((reference number))
Applicant 1: ((applicant name))
Applicant 2: ((respondent name))
Issue date: ((issueDate))
Your reference: ((solicitor reference))

Dear ((solicitor name))

The other party has not yet applied for a conditional order. They have to apply before the ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership)) can progress. 

#What you can do 
The only way to progress the joint application is for the other party to apply for the conditional order. 

If you do not think they will apply then you can submit an application for a conditional order as a sole applicant. You do this by signing into your account and selecting the 'switch to sole CO' event from the menu. 

((signin url)) 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
